dc_title_s: South Mountain showing the positions of the forces of the United States and of the enemy during the battle fought by the Army of the Potomac under the command of Major General G.B. McClellan, Sept. 14th 1862
dc_creator_sm: United States. Army. Corps of Topographical Engineers
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:17,600; 1 map: color; 84 x 54 cm South Mountain, Battle of, Md., 1862--Maps
